page.title: 03HOATH VILLAGE HALL
page.content: {The Village Hall}used to be the school until 1928 when a new school was built.Now it is the most important meeting place in Hoath.People hire it for parties,concerts and wedding receptions and it is used as a{Polling {Station}for elections.These are the groups who use the Hall regularly: {Parish Council}(first Thursday evening in the month) {Gardening Club}(first Wednesday evening in the month) {Men's Club}(Tuesday evenings Oct-May) {Good Companions Club}for over sixties (alternate Thursday afternoons) {Play Group}Tuesday Wednesday +Friday mornings {Hoath School}Monday afternoon {Woman's institute}(third Thursday in the month) {Keep Fit} Monday evenings.
